entry.title: Pyblur v0.2
entry.content:
New Pyblur Release!
Now you can blur your images using the point spread functions (kernels) used in:
Convolutional Neural Networks for Direct Text Deblurring

Github Repo

entry.title: Pyblur Available
entry.content:
Another small project is here!
Pyblur is a Python package providing convenient image blurring functions.
You can either apply one of the supported blur types or have it randomized.
Happy Blurring!

Github Repo

entry.title: Back! Also, Machine Learning and Deep Learning Notes
entry.content:
The last months have been incredibly busy and I haven’t been able to muster the energy to keep on working on this page. A bit ahead of time, but my New Years’ resolution is to be more active here from now on.

But let’s move on to the meatier announcement… I finally collected, scanned and organized a whole lot of notes I took in 2015 when I was studying Machine Learning and Deep Learning, here they are!

Github Repo

entry.title: SynoShows Available
entry.content:
SynoShows, my post-download scripts for managing TV Show episode downloads on my Synology NAS, are now available.
Use them to fully automate those tedious tasks such as renaming the files and moving them to their archiving directory!

Project Page
Github Repo

entry.title: Ravensolver Available
entry.content:
Ravensolver, my Master’s Thesis project, is now available.
RavenSolver is a fully automated generative solver for Progressive Matrix Problems.

Project Page
Github Repo
